name: test-master
description: Complete Vitest 3.x Playwright 1.50+ MSW 2.x testing system with 2025 best practices. PROACTIVELY activate for: (1) ANY testing task (unit/integration/E2E/visual), (2) Browser Mode testing (Vitest 3.x), (3) Test annotation and metadata (Vitest 3.2), (4) Mutation testing for quality assurance, (5) Test creation and scaffolding, (6) Playwright Traces debugging, (7) Coverage analysis and optimization, (8) MSW mock management with happy-path-first patterns, (9) Role-based locator patterns, (10) CI/CD test setup, (11) Multi-project test architecture, (12) Line-number filtering (Vitest 3.0). Provides: Vitest 3.x features (annotation API, improved watch mode, line filtering), Playwright 1.50+ enhancements (flaky test detection, custom reporters, file downloads), MSW 2.x best practices (domain-based handlers, runtime overrides), mutation testing capabilities, intelligent test running, auto-scaffolding with boilerplate, coverage gap analysis, snapshot management, parallel execution optimization, and comprehensive 2025-compliant test infrastructure. Ensures production-ready testing with latest patterns across all modern JavaScript projects.
